description:
Welcome to the world where businesses rely on instant time to market. You need to deploy faster to stay competitive and relevant. DevOps with continuous delivery is the solution. However, you need best-in-class tools to meet this challenge. Jenkins is by far the leading choice to automate the software development lifecycle. Scaling efficiently, handling security and integrating with business tools and processes while keeping pace with an ever-changing technology landscape is hard on your own. The CloudBees Jenkins Platform - Private SaaS Edition simplifies these challenges by providing a cloud native approach to large-scale continuous delivery, on-site or in a public cloud.

Delivered by Kal Vissa and John Pampuch
title: Jenkins World 2016 - Operating CI/CD at Enterprise Scale with Private SaaS Edition
